titleStmt.title: Februar. 18. 1642. Whereas the Lords and Commons of both Houses of Parliament, made request at a common councell holden this day in the afternoone, ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Pennington, Isaac, Sir, 1587?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at bottom of text: Saturday this eighteenth day of February, 1642 [i.e. 1643]. Isaac Pennington Mayor.
Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
